name: Unchained Blades
description:
Classic Dungeon-Crawling and Turn-Based Gameplay
Journey through grid-based dungeons in first-person view while fighting over 180 varieties of monsters in classic turn-based battle totaling over 50 hours of gameplay.

Story-driven Narrative with Voice-overs
A tale of exacting revenge by an arrogant dragon on the goddess that stole his power is brought to life with all-new English voice-overs.

4-Person Battle Party with Unique and Customizable Characters
Additional skills are customizable by allocating growth points to each character's Skill Map to determine which growth path and abilities to pursue.

Compilation of Talented Artists
Boasting character designs from 14 celebrated artists, see a rich contrast between art styles as never before experienced in a single game.

Core Team of Experienced Game Creators
Created by veterans of classic RPGs and the soundtrack is arranged by rising star Tsutomu Narita of Nobuo Uematsu's studio, with the master himself contributing the theme song.
